pkgmetadata.longdescription:
# httparse![CI](https://github.com/adriangb/httparse/actions/workflows/python.yaml/badge.svg)Python wrapper for Rust's [httparse](https://github.com/seanmonstar/httparse).See this project on [GitHub](https://github.com/adriangb/httparse).## Example```pythonfrom httparse import RequestParserparser = RequestParser()buff = b"GET /index.html HTTP/1.1
Host"parsed = parser.parse(buff)assert parsed is None# a partial request, so we try again once we have more databuff = b"GET /index.html HTTP/1.1
Host: example.domain

"parsed = parser.parse(buff)assert parsed is not Noneassert parsed.method == "GET"assert parsed.path == "/index.html"assert parsed.version == 1assert parsed.body_start_offset == len(buff)headers = [(h.name.encode(), h.value) for h in parsed.headers]assert headers == [(b"Host", b"example.domain")]```
